name: Blessed Heart
effects: 40% chance to counter physical attacks with Resilience (910050) to self
40% chance to counter magic attacks with Resilience (910050) to self

name: Blessed Heart
祝福之心
축복의 마음
Cœur bénit
Gesegnetes Herz
Corazón bendito
desc_short: Chance of curing and temporary immunity to poi., blind, sleep, sil., para., conf., dis., stone after receiving phys./mag. attack
受到物理、魔法攻擊時有機率治療「中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化」+暫時提高耐性
공격을 받으면 일정 확률로 독,암흑,수면,침묵,마비,혼란,질병,석화 회복+일시적 저항력 상승
Chance de soigner et d'annuler pois., céc., som., para., conf., mala., et pétri. après une attaque
Heil.+temp. Imm. g. Gi./ Bli./ Schl/ Sti./ Lä./ Ko./ Vi./ Ste. n. ph. o. mag. A.
Posibilita curar y anular ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie al ser atacado
desc_long: Offers a chance of curing and temporarily gaining immunity to poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone when unit receives a physical or magic attack.
受到物理、魔法攻擊時一定機率治療中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化的狀態並暫時提高耐性。
물리, 마법공격을 받으면 일정 확률로 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화를 회복하고 일시적으로 저항력이 상승합니다.
Offre une chance de soigner et de gagner une immunité temporaire contre poison, cécité, sommeil, paralysie, confusion, maladie, et pétrification après aboir reçu une attaque physique ou magique.
Chance auf Heilung und Immunität von Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein nach einem physischen oder magischen Angriff.
